org.apache.giraph.partition

类 BasicPartition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.partition.BasicPartition<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex index value
    V - Vertex value
    E - Edge value
    M - Message data
    所有已实现的接口:
    Iterable<Vertex<I,V,E,M>>, ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,M>, Partition<I,V,E,M>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    直接已知子类:
    ByteArrayPartition, SimplePartition

    public abstract class BasicPartition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements Partition<I,V,E,M>
    Basic partition class for other partitions to extend. Holds partition id, configuration, progressable and partition context
